definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Thankfully, I have a trusted seller in Shenzen.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我在深圳有个可信赖的卖家。

sentences.english: But how reliable are Ekman's methods?
sentences.chinese: 然而，埃克曼的办法有多可信呢？

sentences.english: The SMEC is verified by several tests.
sentences.chinese: 经多种试验校核证实程序可信。

sentences.english: Good price will be for creditable business partner.
sentences.chinese: 好价格将是可信的商业合作伙伴。

sentences.english: This step can ensure that the signers of form are trusted.
sentences.chinese: 这一步骤可以确保表单的签名者是可信的。

sentences.english: Research on trusted software is one of the branches of trusted computing.
sentences.chinese: 软件可信性研究是可信计算的一个分支。

sentences.english: Research on trusted software is one of the branches of trusted computing.
sentences.chinese: 软件可信性研究是可信计算的一个分支。

sentences.english: The relability of information is the life line of future successful information war.
sentences.chinese: 信息的可信度是未来遂行信息化作战的生命线。

sentences.english: That can jeopardize organizational reputations and undermine the credibility of their information.
sentences.chinese: 那就有可能会损害组织的声誉并削弱信息的可信度。

sentences.english: Cars known for dependability will guarantee parts for as many as 70,000 miles.
sentences.chinese: 可信赖的品牌汽车可以提供7万英里的保修期限。

sentences.english: Web readers are persistently weak at judging whether information is trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 网络读者判断信息是否真实可信的能力越来越弱。

sentences.english: These kind of cuts will at least get him some credibility on the budget.
sentences.chinese: 这类支出的削减至少能让他在预算上获得一些可信性。

sentences.english: By now I'll assume you have a fairly convincing CG element composited into your background.
sentences.chinese: 现在我肯定你有相当可信的CG元素合成到背景中了。

sentences.english: Supply authentic, but seeing is believing, welcomed the inspection.
sentences.chinese: 房源真实可信，不过眼见为实，欢迎验看。

sentences.english: You will lose credibility among your friends and colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你会在你朋友和同事之中失去可信度。

sentences.english: In the light of simulation results, the creditability of the sedation system is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 根据仿真结果，分析了仿真系统的可信性。

definition: to have faith in/to believe in/to have confidence in/to respect
to be convinced/to be sure/to firmly believe/to be positive that/definite news
